snippet: Amnesty International said it had satellite images that appeared to show mass graves at a military prison in Nigeria.
abstract: Amnesty International says it has satellite images suggesting mass graves in the northeastern Nigerian city of Maiduguri, following what witnesses have described as the large-scale execution of inmates by security forces at a military prison; reports say shooting of prisoners took place after an attempted prison break by Islamist group Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: Amnesty International said it had satellite images that appeared to show mass graves at a military prison in Nigeria.

headline.main: Rights Group Says Data Suggests Mass Shootings in Nigeria
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Signs of Mass Graves Seen
